entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is described as a famous International Quidditch player. He is mentioned to be watching Harry at the first task.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who flies very well and is considered an equal by Viktor Krum.

entities.name: wronski feint
entities.description: The Wronski Feint is mentioned as a Quidditch move that Viktor Krum performed at the Quidditch World Cup.

relationships.description: Viktor Krum considers Harry as a real rival, an equal in conversation.
Harry saw Viktor Krum perform the Wronski Feint at the Quidditch World Cup.
